events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived and the tracking number shows no updates.
The case has been identified as relating to a delivery delay based on mentions of late shipping and tracking issues.
The support request was assigned to agent Lisa M. for follow-up on the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your order is delayed. I’ll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the latest status?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Elm Street, Springfield, IL 62701.
I’ve contacted the courier and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package should arrive within the next 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you checking with the courier. Fingers crossed it arrives soon.
We’ve confirmed that your package was delivered today. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Just checking in to make sure your order arrived safely and that everything is to your satisfaction.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
